This is a prime example of my hypocrisy towards ntr. First off, we should all know that there are 3 types of ntr, with those types being netorare (mc is the beta), netori (mc is the bull or mc cheats w/ another woman) and netorase (mc is a fucking cuckold who willingly lets lover cheat). I just wanna state that I dislike all these except for netori (love this shit) regardless , I’ll beat my shit to netorare, but netorase? Hell no. Anyways, the fact that it was so good when the boy was cheating w/ the wife, but then it felt like shit when the husband was w/ the girl. Why is that you ask? Well when it comes to all porn, I’m a misogynist and I can’t help it. Now some may ask, why do you jerk off to netorare when you dislike it? My answer; because at the end of the day, porn is porn and it’s a matter of whether I decide to have post nut clarity or post nut depression that night.
